incidents.name: Image and video publishing to LinkedIn is unavailable for all customers

incident_updates.body: Publishing images and video to LinkedIn is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Publishing images and video to LinkedIn should be working properly. No data was lost.
Image and video publishing to LinkedIn isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Calling and CMS is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: CMS and calling are now fully accessible and the account review banners have been removed. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and CMS and calling should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've identified the issue that's caused some customers to see account review banners and some features like Calling and CMS to be unavailable since 11:57 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Nov 16, 2023. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Generative AI features are unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body:
Generative AI features are now fully accessible. The OpenAI outage has been resolved, and all systems are now fully operational. Generative AI features should be working properly. No data was lost.

See the OpenAI incident report here: https://status.openai.com/incidents/21vl32gvx3hb

Our vendor is monitoring an issue that caused Generative AI features to be unavailable since 3:00 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Nov 8, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

See the OpenAI incident report here: https://status.openai.com/incidents/21vl32gvx3hb

incidents.name: Generative AI features are unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body:
Generative AI features are now fully accessible. The OpenAI outage has been resolved, and all systems are now fully operational. Generative AI features should be working properly. No data was lost.

See the OpenAI incident report here: https://status.openai.com/incidents/00fpy0yxrx1q

Our vendor is monitoring an issue that caused Generative AI features to be unavailable since 8:54 AM EST (UTC -05:00) on Nov 8, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

incidents.name: Navigation is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Navigation is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Navigation should be working properly. No data was lost.
Navigation isn't available right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Lists data is incorrect for all customers on the EU data center

incident_updates.body:
Lists data is now fully correct for all customers, including those on the EU data center. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and lists, as well as workflows and emails that rely on lists, should be working properly.

The impact was limited to customers on the EU data center, customers can confirm if they are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

We've addressed the issue that caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment was paused for customers on the EU data center from 7:20 PM EDT to 9:10 PM EDT. Workflow enrollments from 4:00 PM EDT to 7:20 PM EDT may have been incorrect. 

Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center from 8:10 PM EDT to 9:18 PM EDT. Batch email sends from 4:00 PM EDT to 8:10 PM EDT may have been incorrect. Other email types were sent continuously.

We're monitoring performance closely to make sure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment for customers on the EU data center was paused starting at at 7:20 PM EDT to limit impact. Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center starting at 8:10 PM EDT. Other email types will still be sent.

CRM objects may not be visible from CRM index pages and form submissions may not be visible in HubSpot for some customers on the EU data center.

We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

Workflow enrollment for customers on the EU data center was paused starting at at 7:20 PM EDT to limit impact. Batch email sends were paused for customers on the EU data center starting at 8:10 PM EDT. Other email types will still be sent.

We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be incorrect for customers on the EU data center since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. 

We have temporarily paused workflow enrollment for customers on the EU data center to limit impact starting at 7:20 PM EDT. Please pause email sends to help limit impact. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by reviewing this article. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions

We are addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused lists data to be unavailable since 4:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 31, 2023. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information. You can confirm if you are on the EU data center by following the article here. https://knowledge.hubspot.com/account/hubspot-cloud-infrastructure-and-data-hosting-frequently-asked-questions 

Please pause email sends and workflows if you are in the EU to limit impact.

incidents.name: HubSpot is currently unavailable for all customers.

incident_updates.body: HubSpot is now working for all users. We identified and addressed the root cause of the issue that prevented HubSpot from loading, and the issue is fully resolved.
We've addressed the issue that's been preventing HubSpot software from loading since 3:55 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 30, 2023. HubSpot and HubSpot CMS pages are available for all customers.
We've addressed the issue that's been preventing HubSpot software from loading since 3:55 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 30, 2023. HubSpot and HubSpot CMS pages are available for all customers.

A Cloudflare outage has caused HubSpot to be unavailable for all users and HubSpot CMS websites to be degraded since 3:56 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 30, 2023. We're working with Cloudflare to monitor and address the cause of this issue. You can find Cloudflare's status page here https://www.cloudflarestatus.com/
HubSpot is currently unavailable for all users. We're investigating the cause of this issue, and we'll update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Some marketing emails experienced elevated soft bounce rates from October 16th to the 24th

incident_updates.body: From Oct 16, 2023 to Oct 24, 2023, some customers experienced marketing email delivery issues to Outlook. As of 10:00 AM (UTC -04:00) EDT Oct 24, 2023, newly sent marketing emails should be delivered properly. For customers who had soft-bounced email sends, we won’t be re-sending emails to those contacts. If you wish to re-send emails to those contacts, you can create a list from the “Bounced” emails under the “Recipients” from your email, and re-send the email to this list following these instructions: https://knowledge.hubspot.com/email/how-do-i-resend-an-email.

incidents.name: Call quality is degraded for some Mac users

incident_updates.body: Calling quality issues on MacOs Sonoma & Chrome are now resolved. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Calling should be working properly for affected users. No data was lost.

We've discovered that some users who have upgraded to MacOS Sonoma and using Google Chrome for calling are experiencing degraded call quality. 

If the user has already upgraded to Sonoma, we recommend using a non-chromium browser like Mozilla FireFox, or using the "Call my Phone" option. 

We're investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Some Workflow Enrollments are delayed

incident_updates.body: Workflow enrollments are no longer experiencing delays. The issue is now fully resolved and all previously delayed workflows have gone through enrollments as expected.
We’ve identified the cause of the workflow enrollment delay. We’re actively addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page  when we have more information.
Starting around 11:20am ET, some workflow enrollments have been delayed. We're investigating the cause of the issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Some new contacts from Forms are temporarily not being set as marketing contacts.

incident_updates.body: New contacts created through Forms are now correctly being marked as marketing contacts. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and should be working properly. No data has been lost. We are updating any contacts that were not set correctly.

New contacts created through Forms are now correctly being marked as marketing contacts. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and should be working properly. No data has been lost. We are updating any contacts that were not set correctly.

incidents.name: Intermittent serverless function outages

incident_updates.body: The intermittent serverless function outages that occurred on October 5th, 2023 have now been resolved.

There have been two intermittent serverless function outages on October 5th, 2023. The first outage occurred from 5:50 AM EST to 6:24 AM EST, and the second incident took place from 11:21 AM EST to 11:34 AM EST. During both of these outages, all serverless function executions failed. We are currently investigating the root cause.

incidents.name: Some marketing emails experienced elevated soft bounce rates

incident_updates.body: Between 11:49 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 28, 2023 and 3:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 1, 2023, some customers experienced marketing email delivery issues to certain email service providers. This was caused by an update to our email-sending infrastructure. As of 3:00 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Oct 1, 2023, newly sent marketing emails should be delivered properly and the incident has been fully resolved. For customers who had soft-bounced email sends, we won't be re-sending emails to those contacts. If you wish to re-send emails to those contacts, you can create a list from the "Bounced" emails under the "Recipients" from your email, and re-send the email to this list following these instructions https://knowledge.hubspot.com/email/how-do-i-resend-an-email.

incidents.name: Meeting availability is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body:
Google Workspace has identified and addressed the issue affecting Google Calendar. The incident has been fully resolved and calendar availability and calendar connections are working properly. No data was lost.

As part of this incident, notifications were sent to HubSpot users of impacted calendars letting them know that someone tried to book time with them. Since these meetings were not automatically booked, these users should reach out to their contact(s) to confirm their meeting time.

Additionally, prospects may not have received reminder emails for upcoming meetings. Reminders from this timeframe will not be sent retroactively, however, future reminder emails will now be sent as expected.

Google Workspace Update: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace is monitoring the fix to an issue affecting Google Calendar that caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. While this issue should be resolved for some users, we are continuing to check progress with Google Workspace until the issue is fully resolved. Customers who are having issues loading their calendar may be able to fix this by refreshing their browser.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace is monitoring the fix to an issue affecting Google Calendar that caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. While this issue should be resolved for the majority of users, we are continuing to check progress with Google Workspace until the issue is fully resolved. Customers who are having issues loading their calendar may be able to fix this by refreshing their browser.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Google Workspace has identified an issue affecting Google Calendar. It has caused meeting availability and new calendar connections to be unavailable for some users since 9:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 21, 2023. We are monitoring progress with Google Workspace until the issue is resolved.

Google Workspace Status Page: https://www.google.com/appsstatus/dashboard/incidents/7uJZ5F1Uy4n1n74iMacQ

Some calendars are not showing correct availability when booking meetings. Some customers may see meeting requests instead of meetings being automatically booked. They may also experience errors when trying to connect a new calendar. We're investigating the issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Multiple HubSpot processes including logins and page loads  is currently delayed for all customers

incident_updates.body: Page loading and login  is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023 as a problem with an internal database. The issue is now fully resolved.

We've addressed the issue that was causing delayings in page loading and login delays of up to 3 minutes starting at 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023. We're monitoring the tools closely to ensure all processes recover properly.

We've identified the cause of delays to multiple HubSpot processes, including logins and page loading. Users may experience delays of up to 3 min since 10:18 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Sep 20, 2023. These delays may impact tools such as Calling, CRM, and Login in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incident_updates.body: The issue impacting global search has been fixed. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 11:10 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Jul 27, 2023 as a problem with unconventional spike in traffic. The issue is now fully resolved.

Global Search results in HubSpot may be partially unavailable for all customers. This may impact getting any result or certain categories from Global Search. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue.

incident_updates.body: Contacts and related services is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Contacts and related services should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've addressed the issue that caused Contacts and related services to be unavailable from 8:30 PM EDT to 10:00 PM EDT on May 11, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

incidents.name: Tracking links sent by 1:1 sales and service emails were incorrectly flagged as malicious for some customers.

incident_updates.body: We identified an issue where emails sent between 5:48 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 28, 2023 and 7:34 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 28, 2023 with HubSpot email tracking were being incorrectly marked as malicious. Emails sent during this time are no longer marked as malicious.

components.name: Integrations
components.description: Third-party tools integrated into your HubSpot account.

incidents.name: Outlook 365 inboxes are unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Sending emails and booking meetings through Outlook 365 connected accounts is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Outlook 365 inboxes should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've addressed the issue that caused sending emails and booking meetings through Outlook 365 connected accounts to be unavailable since 3:15 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 25, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

Sending emails and booking meetings through HubSpot via connected Outlook 365 accounts is failing for some customers. This is causing users to receive error notifications.
Meetings links are working in offline mode, however, the event will not show on the user's calendar. Instead, they will receive an in-app notification.
We're investigating the issue and will update this page when we have more information.

Sending emails through HubSpot via connected Outlook 365 inboxes is failing for some customers right now. This is causing users to receive notification emails stating “We’ve detected that you’ve hit your sending limit determined by your email inbox provider”. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

Sending emails through HubSpot via connected Outlook 365 inboxes is failing for some customers right now. We're investigating what's causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: The Company Index page was unavailable for all users

incident_updates.body: Between 3:29 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 26, 2023 and 3:45 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 26, 2023, some customers experienced issues with the Company Index page. As of 3:45 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 26, 2023, the page is working properly and the incident has been fully resolved.

We've addressed the issue that caused some Outlook 365 inboxes to be unavailable since 4:00 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Apr 12, 2023. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

components.name: Integrations
components.description: Third-party tools integrated into your HubSpot account.

incidents.name: HubDB-powered website content was unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Between 5:33 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 30, 2023, and 7:09 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 30, 2023, some customers experienced loading issues with live pages depending on HubDB tables. Customers who updated their HubDB tables between 5:33 PM and 5:48 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) resulted in a loading issue with their HubDB tables. Live content from the affected HubDB tables returned a 500 error. The incident has been fully resolved as of 7:09 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 30, 2023. No data was lost, and all content and HubDB tables not loading properly should be working as expected.

incidents.name: Two Factor Authentication (2FA) is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Two Factor Authentication (2FA) is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Two Factor Authentication (2FA) should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've identified the issue that's caused Two Factor Authentication (2FA) to be unavailable since 6:29 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 21, 2023. All customers are now able to log in to their HubSpot accounts using email as their two-factor authentication method. Customers who only had SMS as their two-factor authentication method will receive an email instead. We are continuing to address the issue impacting SMS two-factor authentication. We will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified the issue that's caused Two Factor Authentication (2FA) to be unavailable since 6:29 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 21, 2023. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.
Two Factor Authentication (2FA) isn’t available for some customers. We’re investigating what’s causing this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Conversations is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Conversations is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 5:27 PM EDT (UTC -04:00).
Conversations in HubSpot is unavailable for some customers. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: Page and blog post saving is unavailable for some customers

incident_updates.body: Page, blog post, global content, design tools, and pop-up CTAs saving is now fully accessible. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved and Page, blog post, global content, design tools, and pop-up CTAs saving should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've identified the issue that's caused pages, blog post, global content, design tools, and pop-up CTAs saving to be unavailable since 12:21 PM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 13, 2023. We're addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Traffic analytics is currently delayed for all customers

incident_updates.body: Traffic analytics is no longer experiencing delays for customers in North America. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 7:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 13, 2023 as a problem with an abnormal volume of activity. The issue is now fully resolved. No data was lost. Customers in other regions were not affected.

We've identified the cause of the Traffic analytics delays of up to 30min since 7:30 AM EDT (UTC -04:00) on Mar 13, 2023. These delays may impact tools such as Workflows and Lists in HubSpot. Our team is investigating the cause of this issue and will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: Outgoing emails through Gmail are failing for some customers

incident_updates.body: Gmail deliverability is now fully restored. We've identified and addressed the root cause of the issue. The incident has been fully resolved as of March 3, 11:41 EST, and all sends should be working properly. No data was lost.

We've addressed the issue that affected the deliverability of emails through Gmail for some customers in our EU data center. All new email sends are not experiencing the issue. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've addressed the issue that affected the deliverability of emails through Gmail for some customers in our EU data center. All new email sends are not experiencing the issue. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.
We've addressed the issue that affected the deliverability of emails through Gmail for some customers in our EU data center. We're monitoring performance closely to ensure the tools recover properly.

We've identified the issue that affects the deliverability of emails through Gmail for some customers in our EU data center. This issue started approximately 9:00 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 7, 2023. We continue addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

We continue addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.

incidents.name: Workflow enrollment is currently delayed for some customers

incident_updates.body: Workflow enrollments is no longer experiencing delays. We've identified and addressed the cause of the delays that began at 1:44 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 9, 2023. The issue is now fully resolved.
We are continuing to work through the issue that is causing some workflow enrollments to be delayed. We will update this page when more information is available.

We have identified the issue causing enrollment delays for some workflows using the following enrollment types: association filters, analytics filters, and/or integration event filters. We are addressing the issue and a fix is currently in progress. Some enrollments may continue to be delayed through the weekend, but new enrollments will not be impacted. We will continue to update this page as more information becomes available.
We are continuing to investigate the issue that is causing some workflow enrollments to be delayed. We will update this page when more information is available.

We’ve identified an issue causing workflow enrollment delays for some customers starting at 1:44 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 9, 2023. The issue impacts some workflows that use an enrollment filter of one of these three types: some association filters, analytics filters, and integration event filters. We are addressing the issue and additional workflows will not be affected. We will update this page when more information is available.

We’ve identified an issue causing workflow enrollment delays for some customers starting at 1:44 PM EST (UTC -05:00) on Mar 9, 2023. We are addressing the issue and have prevented it from impacting new workflows. We will update this page when more information is available.

incidents.name: Some customers are seeing incorrect product limits

incident_updates.body: We’ve addressed an issue that was preventing some customers from creating or viewing pages, workflows, lists, reports, and dashboards within their HubSpot accounts. We’re still monitoring the fix to ensure all accounts have recovered.

We’ve addressed an issue that has been preventing some customers from creating or viewing pages, workflows, lists, reports, and dashboards within their HubSpot accounts. We’re monitoring the fix closely to ensure all tools recover properly.
We're continuing to address an issue preventing some customers from creating or viewing pages, workflows, lists, reports, and dashboards. We will update this page when we have more information.

We've identified an issue preventing some customers from creating or viewing pages, workflows, lists, reports, and dashboards. We’re addressing the cause of this issue and will update this page when we have more information.
Some customers are not able to create or view content due to incorrect product limits. We are currently investigating the cause of this issue.
